<script>
// Search and filter functionality
function initializeSearch() {
  const searchInput = document.getElementById('publication-search');
  const yearFilter = document.getElementById('year-filter');
  const areaFilter = document.getElementById('area-filter');
  const papers = document.querySelectorAll('.paper');
  
  function filterPapers() {
    const searchTerm = searchInput.value.toLowerCase();
    const selectedYear = yearFilter.value;
    const selectedArea = areaFilter.value;
    
    papers.forEach(paper => {
      const title = paper.querySelector('.paper-title')?.textContent.toLowerCase() || '';
      const authors = paper.querySelector('p:nth-of-type(2)')?.textContent.toLowerCase() || '';
      const venue = paper.querySelector('p:nth-of-type(3)')?.textContent.toLowerCase() || '';
      const tags = Array.from(paper.querySelectorAll('.tag')).map(tag => tag.textContent.toLowerCase()).join(' ');
      
      // Extract year from venue text
      const yearMatch = venue.match(/\b(20\d{2})\b/);
      const paperYear = yearMatch ? yearMatch[1] : '';
      
      // Search filter
      const matchesSearch = searchTerm === '' || 
        title.includes(searchTerm) || 
        authors.includes(searchTerm) || 
        venue.includes(searchTerm) ||
        tags.includes(searchTerm);
      
      // Year filter
      const matchesYear = selectedYear === '' || paperYear === selectedYear;
      
      // Area filter
      const matchesArea = selectedArea === '' || tags.includes(selectedArea.toLowerCase());
      
      // Show/hide paper
      if (matchesSearch && matchesYear && matchesArea) {
        paper.style.display = 'flex';
      } else {
        paper.style.display = 'none';
      }
    });
    
    // Show/hide year headers
    const yearHeaders = document.querySelectorAll('h2');
    yearHeaders.forEach(header => {
      const yearText = header.textContent.trim();
      let hasVisiblePapers = false;
      
      let nextElement = header.nextElementSibling;
      while (nextElement && nextElement.tagName !== 'H2') {
        if (nextElement.classList.contains('paper') && nextElement.style.display !== 'none') {
          hasVisiblePapers = true;
          break;
        }
        nextElement = nextElement.nextElementSibling;
      }
      
      header.style.display = hasVisiblePapers ? 'block' : 'none';
    });
  }
  
  // Add event listeners
  searchInput.addEventListener('input', filterPapers);
  yearFilter.addEventListener('change', filterPapers);
  areaFilter.addEventListener('change', filterPapers);
}

// BibTeX copy functionality
function copyBibTeX(bibId) {
  const bibElement = document.getElementById('bibtex-' + bibId);
  const bibText = bibElement.textContent.trim();
  
  // Copy to clipboard
  navigator.clipboard.writeText(bibText).then(function() {
    showCopyNotification();
  }).catch(function(err) {
    // Fallback for older browsers
    fallbackCopyTextToClipboard(bibText);
  });
}

function fallbackCopyTextToClipboard(text) {
  const textArea = document.createElement("textarea");
  textArea.value = text;
  
  // Avoid scrolling to bottom
  textArea.style.top = "0";
  textArea.style.left = "0";
  textArea.style.position = "fixed";
  
  document.body.appendChild(textArea);
  textArea.focus();
  textArea.select();
  
  try {
    document.execCommand('copy');
    showCopyNotification();
  } catch (err) {
    console.error('Fallback: Oops, unable to copy', err);
  }
  
  document.body.removeChild(textArea);
}

function showCopyNotification() {
  // Remove existing notification if any
  const existing = document.querySelector('.copy-notification');
  if (existing) {
    existing.remove();
  }
  
  // Create new notification
  const notification = document.createElement('div');
  notification.className = 'copy-notification';
  notification.textContent = 'BibTeX copied to clipboard!';
  
  document.body.appendChild(notification);
  
  // Remove after 3 seconds
  setTimeout(() => {
    if (notification.parentNode) {
      notification.remove();
    }
  }, 3000);
}

// Initialize everything when page loads
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // Initialize search functionality
  initializeSearch();
  
  // Add publication statistics
  const papers = document.querySelectorAll('.paper');
  const years = [...new Set(Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('h2')).map(h => h.textContent.trim()).filter(y => /^\d{4}/.test(y)))];
  
  console.log(`Publications loaded: ${papers.length} papers across ${years.length} years`);
});
</script>
